com.tojc.ormlite.android
Class OrmLiteSimpleContentProvider

java.lang.Object
  android.content.ContentProvider
      com.tojc.ormlite.android.OrmLiteBaseContentProvider<T>
          com.tojc.ormlite.android.OrmLiteDefaultContentProvider<OrmLiteSimpleContentProvider.OrmLiteSqliteSimpleHelper>
              com.tojc.ormlite.android.OrmLiteSimpleContentProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, OrmLiteSimpleHelperCallback
public abstract class OrmLiteSimpleContentProvider
extends OrmLiteDefaultContentProvider<OrmLiteSimpleContentProvider.OrmLiteSqliteSimpleHelper>
implements OrmLiteSimpleHelperCallback

This is a simple class that utilizes the framework. You can make ContentProvider minimal implementation. This is an example of how to implement OrmLiteDefaultContentProvider.

Author:
Jaken
